useMoreSlot.description: See more custom slot usage flags
useMoreSlot.description_zh: 查看更多的自定义插槽使用标志

line-num.description: See more collapsed panels, the number of rows displayed when collapsed
line-num.description_zh: 查看更多的折叠面板，收起时的显示行数

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the binding value changes

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Toggle the expansion state of all panels, pass true to expand all, false to collapse all, and no parameters to switch all
methods.description_zh: 切换所有面板展开状态，传 true 为全部展开，false 为全部收起，不传参为全部切换

slots.name: title
slots.description: Title, which is easy for developers to customize the title (not used by viewmore)
slots.description_zh: 标题，便于开发者自定义标题（非 viewmore 使用）

slots.name: more
slots.description: See more, which allows developers to customize and view more types of expansion and collapse styles
slots.description_zh: 查看更多，便于开发者自定义查看更多类型的展开收起样式
